alert.note: Alert for Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 8:22PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Cherry County through 900 PM CDT... At 822 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Merriman, or 23 miles south of Martin. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Highway 61 Crossing The Niobrara River. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 141 and 149. Highway 61 between mile markers 217 and 220. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for north central Nebraska.
